taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013
IUCN Red List (Species Assessed for Global Conservation)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Found over muddy bottoms in shallow, sheltered bays.  Also occurs over sandy areas off beaches.  Juveniles inhabit very shallow sandy shores.  Feeds on fish (Ref. 5595).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  widely distributed in Lake Malawi and upper Shire River.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Eastern Africa: Lake Malawi and upper Shiré River

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#DiagnosticDescription
dataObjects.description: Diagnosis: snout longer than B. lepturus, and subadults deeper bodied (Ref. 55954).Coloration: dark band on the lateral line; subadults typically yellow (Ref. 55954).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: benthopelagic; freshwater; pH range: 7.4 - 8.4; dH range: 7 - 30

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Conservation
dataObjects.title: IUCN Red List Assessment

dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Kazembe, J., Makocho, P. & Mailosi, A. 2006. Buccochromis rhoadesii. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description:
Red List Category
LC
Least Concern

Red List Criteria

Version
3.1

Year Assessed
2006

Assessor/s
Kazembe, J., Makocho, P. & Mailosi, A.

Reviewer/s
Snoeks, J. (Freshwater Fish Red List Authority) & Darwall, W. (Freshwater Biodiversity Assessment Programme)

Contributor/s

Justification
Endemic to Lake Malawi. Widespread but with local decline, which is not thought to extend to the full lake-wide population.
